abstract: “While I’m pleased that Ms. Lynch will be confirmed as attorney general, her nomination process is proof of all that is wrong with Republican leadership.” — Senator Harry Reid, the Democratic minority leader.

headline.main: Verbatim: Loretta Lynch Inches Closer to Confirmation

snippet: “While I’m pleased that Ms. Lynch will be confirmed as attorney general, her nomination process is proof of all that is wrong with Republican leadership.” — Senator Harry Reid, the Democratic minority leader.
